tables.name: Season

columns.name: seasonId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN seasonId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: publisherId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN publisherId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: name
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN name STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: description
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN description STRING(MAX)

columns.name: coverImageFilename
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN coverImageFilename STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: createdTimestamp
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN createdTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL

columns.name: lastChangeTimestamp
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN lastChangeTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL

columns.name: state
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN state FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: totalEpisodes
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Season ADD COLUMN totalEpisodes FLOAT64 NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE Season (seasonId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, publisherId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, name STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, description STRING(MAX), coverImageFilename STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, createdTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, lastChangeTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, state FLOAT64 NOT NULL, totalEpisodes FLOAT64 NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (seasonId ASC)

indexes.name: ByLastChangeTimestamp
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE INDEX ByLastChangeTimestamp ON Season(publisherId, lastChangeTimestamp DESC, state)

tables.name: SeasonGrade

columns.name: seasonId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE SeasonGrade ADD COLUMN seasonId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: gradeId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE SeasonGrade ADD COLUMN gradeId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: startTimestamp
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE SeasonGrade ADD COLUMN startTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL

columns.name: endTimestamp
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE SeasonGrade ADD COLUMN endTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL

columns.name: grade
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE SeasonGrade ADD COLUMN grade FLOAT64 NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE SeasonGrade (seasonId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, gradeId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, startTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, endTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, grade FLOAT64 NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (seasonId ASC, gradeId ASC), INTERLEAVE IN PARENT Season ON DELETE CASCADE

indexes.name: ByEndTimestamp
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE INDEX ByEndTimestamp ON SeasonGrade(endTimestamp DESC, startTimestamp DESC)

tables.name: EpisodeDraft

columns.name: seasonId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN seasonId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: episodeId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN episodeId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: name
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN name STRING(MAX)

columns.name: videoFilename
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN videoFilename STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: videoState
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN videoState FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: resumableVideoUpload
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN resumableVideoUpload BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: videoUploadedTimestamp
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN videoUploadedTimestamp TIMESTAMP

columns.name: videoLength
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN videoLength FLOAT64

columns.name: videoSize
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE EpisodeDraft ADD COLUMN videoSize FLOAT64

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE EpisodeDraft (seasonId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, episodeId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, name STRING(MAX), videoFilename STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, videoState FLOAT64 NOT NULL, resumableVideoUpload BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL, videoUploadedTimestamp TIMESTAMP, videoLength FLOAT64, videoSize FLOAT64) PRIMARY KEY (seasonId ASC, episodeId ASC), INTERLEAVE IN PARENT Season ON DELETE CASCADE

indexes.name: ByUploadedTimestamp
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE INDEX ByUploadedTimestamp ON EpisodeDraft(videoUploadedTimestamp DESC)

tables.name: Episode

columns.name: seasonId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN seasonId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: episodeId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN episodeId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: name
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN name STRING(MAX)

columns.name: index
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN index FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: videoFilename
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN videoFilename STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: videoLength
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN videoLength FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: videoSize
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN videoSize FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN publishedTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL

columns.name: premierTimestamp
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Episode ADD COLUMN premierTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE Episode (seasonId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, episodeId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, name STRING(MAX), index FLOAT64 NOT NULL, videoFilename STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, videoLength FLOAT64 NOT NULL, videoSize FLOAT64 NOT NULL, publishedTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, premierTimestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (seasonId ASC, episodeId ASC), INTERLEAVE IN PARENT Season ON DELETE CASCADE

indexes.name: ByIndex
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE INDEX ByIndex ON Episode(index DESC)
